name: Flygon GX
author: PLANETA Tsuji

abilities.name: Dusty Defense
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, all of your Pokémon take 30 less damage from your opponent’s attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Desert Hurricane
attacks.effect: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 120 more damage. Then, discard that Stadium card.

attacks.name: Sonic Edge GX
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by any effects on your opponent’s Active Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
